Summary Note:
The RM first met Peltola Paananen at a wine tasting event in Helsinki. They discovered a shared passion for fine wines and decided to explore potential business ventures together.
With a career spanning nearly 13 years, Peltola Paananen has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Peltola Paananen and Ella have been married since 2020. Peltola and Ella have 1 child, named Niemi.
Education Background:
Peltola graduated from Parikkalan lukio in 2007.
Peltola finished his studies at University of Helsinki in 2013.
Occupation History:
Peltola Paananen is a 36 year old and comes from Finland.
Peltola Paananen launched his career as a Property Manager at Citycon Oyj, where he gained valuable experience from 2012 to 2014.
His subsequent role was as a Developer at Technopolis Plc, where he continued to grow professionally from 2015 till now.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 100000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He owns flat in Rauma, where he resides. It is worth 610000 EUR.

He inherited 8100000 EUR from his grandmother, a well-known Hedge Fund Manager, in 2015, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
Client Summary: The RM is very happy to have Peltola as a customer and is looking forward to a long and successful cooperation.
